title: Tariff war: It‚Äôs time to buy India, not sell, says Jefferies‚Äô Wood
content: Jefferies' Christopher Wood advises investors to buy Indian equities, anticipating Trump will back down from tariff threats, which are not in America's interest. Wood highlights India's recent underperformance and high valuations but notes its tendency to rebound after such periods.

title: Voter 'chori' claim: INDIA bloc to bring impeachment notice against CEC?
content: Following Rahul Gandhi's allegations of vote irregularities in Karnataka, the Congress party is considering strong actions against Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar, who demanded an apology or affidavit from Gandhi. Opposition parties are contemplating an impeachment motion against Kumar during the Monsoon Session, accusing him of bias towards the BJP.

title: Bold statement! 'India vs Pakistan Asia Cup match nahi hoga' - Watch
content: Former Indian cricketer Kedar Jadhav predicts that the highly anticipated India vs Pakistan Asia Cup 2025 match will not occur. This statement aligns with Harbhajan Singh's earlier sentiment, advocating for India to boycott playing Pakistan, prioritizing national interests following recent terror attacks. Singh emphasized that the sacrifices made by soldiers outweigh the importance of a cricket match.

title: Stock market: Sensex rallies over 1,000 points on GST reforms push, S&P upgrade; Nifty50 crosses 24,950
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, soared in opening trade on Monday on the back of next-generation GST reforms announced by PM Modi during his Independence Day speech, and S&P Global's credit rating upgrade.

title: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates on the job he cannot do: I wouldn't enjoy..
content: Bill Gates, during a mock interview with Stephen Curry, revealed his preference for product creation over sales and marketing roles. He admitted his lack of expertise in persuasion and emphasized his passion for defining and developing technology. Gates highlighted the importance of teamwork, acknowledging his need for partners skilled in marketing to complement his strengths.

title: Arjun Tendulkar‚Äôs fianc√©e Saaniya Chandhok spotted in old video with Sara Tendulkar ‚Äì Watch
content: An old video of Sara Tendulkar with Saaniya Chandhok, Arjun Tendulkar's fianc√©e, has resurfaced, showcasing their close bond. The video, originally shared in August 2024, captures the trio enjoying a day at a petting zoo and pig farm in the UK. This resurfaced clip highlights Saaniya's long-standing connection with the Tendulkar family, prior to her recent engagement to Arjun in a private ceremony.

title: 'Big day at White House': Trump rules out Nato, Crimea hopes for Ukraine; focus on Zelenskyy
content: Donald Trump stated that Volodymyr Zelenskyy could end the Russia-Ukraine war quickly. He suggested Ukraine should not pursue NATO membership. Trump also mentioned Crimea's annexation under Barack Obama. Several European leaders are expected to visit the White House. This visit occurs before Zelenskyy's meeting with European leaders and NATO. Concerns arose after Trump met Vladimir Putin without Zelenskyy's presence.

title: Jabalpur bank heist: How robbery was planned inside CG jail
content: In a brazen daylight heist, the Khitola bank robbery was orchestrated from within Raigarh jail, Chhattisgarh. Police have apprehended four suspects, including Raees Singh Lodhi, the mastermind, but the 15 kg of stolen gold remains unrecovered. The gang, involving local accomplices and a Jharkhand-based group, meticulously planned the crime, utilizing rented accommodations and motorcycles for their escape.

title: Apple India leases 2.7 lakh sq ft of office space in Bengaluru
content: Apple India has leased a 2.7 lakh sq ft office space in Bengaluru for 10 years, valued at Rs 1,010 crore, signaling a major expansion. Located in Embassy Zenith, it could accommodate over 1,200 employees. Apple is also considering expanding its footprint in the same building and opening new retail stores in India.

title: Untold tale: Sunil Gavaskar could get away with murder - Ex-teammate
content: Karsan Ghavri revealed Sunil Gavaskar's unwavering focus, recalling an instance when Gavaskar prioritized his batting concentration over meeting then Prime Minister Morarji Desai. Ghavri also highlighted Gavaskar's infamous slow innings in the 1975 World Cup, where he defied team expectations and played at his own pace, frustrating teammates with his unconventional approach.

title: Delhi‚Äôs new school fee law: Why it's not as simple as it sounds
content: The Delhi School Education (Transparency in Fixation and Regulation of Fees) Bill, 2025, aims to regulate fees in all private schools across the city by involving parents in fee fixation and grievance redressal committees. The law introduces penalties for unauthorised fee hikes and grants enforcement powers to the Director of Education. While the government highlights increased transparency and parental participation, parent groups protest the bill, demanding greater accountability and public consultation.

title: 'Greg Chappell caused insecurity in the team': Irfan Pathan reveals untold story
content: Irfan Pathan reflects on Greg Chappell's tenure as India's coach, acknowledging personal benefits but noting the cultural clash. Chappell's aggressive communication, emphasizing performance-based selection, created insecurity within the team. Pathan believes Chappell's intent was positive but his failure to adapt to Indian culture ultimately hindered his success, a crucial lesson in coaching.

title: Microsoft's new return to office plan: Company requires 3-day office attendance
content: Microsoft will require employees within 50 miles of its Redmond headquarters to work from the office at least three days a week starting in January 2026, aligning with similar moves by other tech giants like Amazon, Google, and Meta.

title: Vice presidential poll: Nitish Kumar's JD(U) backs NDA's candidate CP Radhakrishnan
content: Janata Dal (United) president Nitish Kumar has pledged his party's support to NDA's vice-presidential candidate, CP Radhakrishnan. The BJP nominated Radhakrishnan, currently the Governor of Maharashtra, aiming for a unanimous election. Prime Minister Modi lauded Radhakrishnan's dedication and intellect, highlighting his extensive community service. The vice-presidential election follows Jagdeep Dhankhar's resignation, with polling scheduled for September 9.

title: 'She is a very good mother': Sunjay Kapur's sister praises Karisma Kapoor
content: Following the unexpected death of business tycoon Sunjay Kapur, his sister, Mandhira Kapur, has publicly commended his ex-wife, Karisma Kapoor, for her excellent parenting and dedication to maintaining family unity. Mandhira emphasized Karisma's efforts to keep the family connected, particularly for the sake of her children, amidst ongoing family tensions regarding control of the Rs 30,000 crore company.

title: Asia Cup squad: Shubman Gill set to be dropped? Other big names on the chopping block
content: The BCCI selection committee is convening to finalise India's Asia Cup 2025 squad, facing tough choices post-Kohli and Sharma retirements. Shubman Gill's T20I spot is uncertain, with Abhishek Sharma and Sanju Samson favored as openers. Mohammed Siraj may be dropped despite his England tour performance, while Bumrah is expected to stay.

title: 'Tied to pole, beaten': Army jawan assaulted by toll workers in UP; 4 arrested
content: In Uttar Pradesh's Meerut, an Army jawan, Kapil Kavad, was assaulted by toll plaza workers. Kavad was en route to Delhi airport with his cousin to return to duty when the incident happened at Bhuni Toll Plaza on the Meerut‚ÄìKarnal highway on Sunday night. Video footage shows multiple toll employees beating and restraining Kavad.

title: NYC nightclub shooting: Three dead, nine injured as people run to escape - Watch
content: A mass shooting at a Brooklyn nightclub early Sunday morning resulted in three fatalities and nine injuries, with police suspecting gang involvement and up to four shooters. The victims ranged from 19 to 61 years old. Authorities recovered 42 shell casings and a firearm nearby, marking the city's second mass shooting in recent weeks.

title: Debut on a new pitch? Pathan may join politics - 'Aapko lagta hai aana chahiye?'
content: Following his brother Yusuf's successful entry into politics and victory in the Baharampur Lok Sabha seat, Irfan Pathan has hinted at a potential foray into the political arena. When questioned about his interest, the former India all-rounder expressed his desire to make a difference, suggesting that he would only join politics if he could positively impact society.

title: Watch: Floods batter Pakistan; homes swamped, roads submerged
content: Devastating flash floods in Pakistan have claimed at least 657 lives, including many children, with Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province being the hardest hit. Entire villages have been wiped out, mass burials are underway, and hundreds remain missing as rescue efforts continue amidst warnings of more torrential rains. The scale of destruction is immense, with eyewitnesses recounting homes and vehicles swept away.

title: John Cena on heel turn: WWE legend says his failed promo 'bombed'
content: John Cena's heel turn in WWE shocked fans. His first promo as a villain did not succeed. Cena confessed he failed but learned from it. Despite the rocky start, he won a 17th World Championship. Cena's heel run sparked mixed reactions. He is balancing WWE and Hollywood. His final match is scheduled for December 2025.

title: Dislocated ankle, ball to face: Trent Rockets players suffer freak injuries - Watch
content: Trent Rockets faced a tough couple of matches. Adam Hose dislocated his ankle during a match against Southern Brave. Tom Alsop suffered a facial injury in a game against London Spirit. Hose's injury appears serious. Alsop was hit by a ball after it crept through the grill of the helmet. He had to retire hurt. These injuries will impactthe team's campaign.

title: Tulsi can reduce cortisol by 36%: Here‚Äôs how it works & the right way to use it
content: A recent study published in the National Library of Medicine reveals that holy basil extract significantly reduces cortisol levels, the body's stress hormone, by up to 36%. The eight-week trial, involving 100 adults, demonstrated improvements in sleep quality and blood pressure, highlighting holy basil's potential as a natural stress reliever.

title: Watch: Neymar Jr breaks down in tears after worst career defeat; Santos manager fired
content: Neymar Jr. experienced a devastating defeat with Santos, losing 6-0 to Vasco da Gama, leading to visible distress and the dismissal of head coach Cl√©ber Xavier. The Brazilian star expressed shame and anger over the performance, which was the heaviest defeat in his career. Santos now faces a relegation battle, further adding to Neymar's frustrations as he's suspended for the next match.

title: ‚ÄòIssues must be resolved with Ukraine‚Äôs participation‚Äô: Zelenskyy
content: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy welcomes Washington's security guarantee commitment, envisioning a trilateral format with the US and Russia. While Russia seeks its own guarantees, Trump aims to mediate, hinting at a potential meeting with Putin after Zelenskyy. European leaders express cautious optimism, but divisions remain, particularly regarding potential territorial concessions. Fighting persists despite diplomatic efforts, with reported casualties from Russian strikes.

title: Delhi bomb scare: DPS Dwarka receives threat call; search operations underway
content: Delhi Public School in Dwarka faced a bomb threat on Monday, leading to immediate evacuation and searches by police and bomb disposal squads. This incident follows a similar situation on July 18, where over 20 schools in Delhi, including Abhinav Public School and Richmondd Global School, received bomb threats via email, prompting evacuations and extensive search operations by authorities.

title: Mumbai rains: Triple-digit showers drench city; IMD maintains orange alert till Tuesday
content: Mumbai experienced continuous rainfall, with several areas recording triple-digit figures in the last 24 hours. The IMD has issued an orange alert for Mumbai and Thane until August 19, forecasting heavy to very heavy showers. Water stock in the seven lakes supplying Mumbai has reached 93.20%, surpassing the 2024 level.

title: Vice presidential election: INDIA bloc may discuss its candidate today; NDA pick announced
content: The INDIA bloc is set to begin discussions on its Vice-Presidential candidate during a Monday meeting, coinciding with Parliament's resumption after an Independence Day break. This meeting gains importance after clashes with the government over SIR disrupted the monsoon session.

title: Hyderabad tragedy: Chariot touches live wires; 5 dead, 4 injured
content: Tragedy struck Hyderabad's Ramanthapur area late Sunday night during a Krishna Janmashtami procession. A chariot came into contact with live electric wires, resulting in the deaths of five people and injuries to four others. Uppal police have confirmed the casualties and are investigating the cause of the incident.

title: Stocks to buy this week: What's the outlook for Nifty? Check list of top recommendations
content: Stock market recommendations: SBI Securities' Sudeep Shah suggests Uno Minda Ltd and HDFC Life as top stock picks for the week starting August 18, 2025. Nifty snapped a six-week losing streak, but faces resistance at 24750-24800. Bank Nifty traded narrowly, with key resistance at 55700‚Äì55800.

title: Cricket | 'Ek banda fail hue ja raha hai...' - Pathan backs Gambhir to end 'star culture'
content: Irfan Pathan supports Gautam Gambhir's focus on team culture over star culture in Indian cricket, emphasizing the need to move past favoring established players despite performance decline. Pathan also praises selector Ajit Agarkar's balanced approach and highlights the importance of coach-selector alignment in decision-making for fostering a merit-based environment. This shift aims to define a new era for Indian cricket.

title: 'List of 65 lakh voters deleted from Bihar rolls uploaded within 56 hours of SC order': CEC
content: The Election Commission (EC) addressed concerns regarding the deletion of 65 lakh voters from Bihar's electoral roll, clarifying that the list was uploaded promptly following a Supreme Court directive. The EC urged electors and political parties to utilize the remaining 15-day window to file claims and objections.

title: IPL | Dewald Brevis contract controversy: Former CSK players slams R Ashwin
content: Former CSK player Anirudha Srikkanth has criticised R Ashwin for publicly discussing teammate Dewald Brevis‚Äô contract, deeming it inappropriate for a current player to do so. Ashwin's comments about CSK potentially paying extra for Brevis in IPL 2025 sparked controversy, leading to a clarification from the franchise. While Ashwin defended his remarks, Anirudha emphasized the sensitivity of contract discussions among teammates.

title: BJP team at Dharmasthala temple, alleges Karnataka CM behind 'smear campaign'
content: A BJP delegation, led by B Y Vijayendra, visited Dharmasthala temple to show support amid allegations of a smear campaign against the temple. R Ashoka accused Siddaramaiah of instigating unrest and blamed "urban naxals" and the "anti-Hindu Tipu gang" for the conspiracy.

title: 'Usko kya nazar aayega?‚Äô: Miandad on Babar Azam's Asia Cup snub
content: Pakistan cricket board announced its team. Babar Azam and Mohammed Rizwan are not in the team for the upcoming tri-series in UAE and Asia Cup. Salman Ali Agha will lead the team. Shaheen Shah Afridi is included in the squad. Javed Miandad criticized the selectors for excluding Babar. Pakistan will play against Afghanistan and UAE in the tri-series.

title: Bihar man dies in attack by 20 monkeys
content: In a tragic incident in Bihar's Madhubani district, a 67-year-old man, Ramnath Chaudhary, died after being attacked by a troop of over 20 monkeys. The incident occurred while he was collecting fodder for his livestock in Shahpur village. Local authorities have been alerted and are urging the forest department to capture the monkeys to prevent further incidents.

title: Under scanner! 'The problem with Virat Kohli ... ': Ex-cricketer breaks silence
content: Irfan Pathan has addressed criticism regarding his comments on Virat Kohli's batting form, particularly Kohli's Test retirement after struggling in Australia. Pathan emphasised that while he initially supported Kohli during his slump, the team's success remains paramount. As a commentator, Pathan believes his responsibility lies with the fans, necessitating honest analysis of player performance, both positive and negative.

title: Coolie box office: Rajinikanth‚Äôs starrer set to surpass Rs 200 crore in domestic market
content: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' is a box office sensation, celebrated as a festival by fans. Despite clashing with Bollywood's 'War 2,' it dominated the opening weekend, heading towards ‚Çπ200 crore in just four days. The film earned ‚Çπ34 crore on Sunday, bringing its total to ‚Çπ193.25 crore in India.

title: Oppn show of strength in Bihar as allies join Rahul's 'Vote Adhikar Yatra'
content: India bloc launched 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Sasaram, Bihar, led by Rahul Gandhi, protesting against alleged electoral roll discrepancies and "vote theft." The event showcased the unity of the 'mahagathbandhan' with RJD, CPM, CPI(M-L) Liberation, CPI, and VIP leaders joining Congress. Lalu Prasad's fiery speech and Tejashwi's warning to central leaders highlighted the rally.

title: Exports to US likely saw 7x faster growth vs overall rise
content: Indian exports to the US surged by 21% due to frontloading in anticipation of Trump's tariffs, overshadowing overall export growth. While exporters are offering discounts to retain business amidst uncertainty, concerns remain about sustaining operations if tariffs reach 50%. Industry leaders are seeking government support to mitigate potential job losses, particularly in the MSME sector.

title: Give affidavit within 7 days or apologise: CEC to Rahul
content: Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar has challenged Rahul Gandhi to substantiate his claims of electoral roll irregularities and 'vote theft' within seven days, demanding either sworn proof or a public apology. Kumar refuted the allegations, citing transparent electoral processes and endorsements from party representatives.

title: Ciara becomes first descendants of enslaved Africans to get Benin citizenship under new law
content: Ciara, the Grammy-winning singer, has made history by becoming one of the first to receive Beninese citizenship through a program aimed at reconnecting descendants of enslaved Africans. This initiative seeks to heal historical wounds and strengthen ties with the Black diaspora. Benin's efforts carry significant weight due to its role in the transatlantic slave trade.

title: Rahul hits back at EC, says it's helping BJP steal votes
content: Rahul Gandhi, during the 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar, accused the Election Commission of colluding with the BJP in "vote theft." He alleged a 2023 law shields election commissioners from legal action, enabling the EC to favor the ruling party.

title: 'Don‚Äôt be like me: Rodman slams Travis Hunter; Leanna Lenee relationship sparks backlash
content: Dennis Rodman ignited controversy by criticizing NFL star Travis Hunter's marriage to Leanna Lenee during a live Twitch stream. Rodman's unexpected jab added fuel to existing online scrutiny of the couple's relationship. Hunter has publicly defended his wife against accusations of exploitation, asserting his love and dismissing the negativity surrounding their union, which culminated in a recent Tennessee wedding.

title: 4 Indian-origin men held over armed attack in England
content: In Bilston, near Wolverhampton, a violent armed assault led to the arrest of four Indian-origin men: Hardeep Singh, Harpeet Singh, Mukesh Kumar, and Lakwinder Singh. The incident, involving bladed weapons, left three men seriously wounded and a car heavily damaged. Police investigations are ongoing after responding to reports of a fight, with authorities believing it to be a targeted attack.

title: Despite $500, fine Beyonc√© turns Netflix‚Äôs ‚ÄúBeyonc√© Bowl‚Äù into a triumph outshining the league
content: Beyonc√©'s 'Beyonc√© Bowl' halftime show on Christmas Day 2024 redefined live sports entertainment. Her Cowboy Carter-themed performance, despite potential fines for rhinestone hazards, drew record viewership of over 27 million, validating Netflix's live sports strategy. The spectacle, featuring hits and special guests, sparked mixed reactions but ultimately proved music-first programming's power.

title: LeBron's wife Savannah James reveals their love story might have ended
content: Savannah James, wife of NBA star LeBron James, revealed in a podcast episode that their relationship might not have survived if LeBron hadn't been drafted by the Cleveland Cavaliers. She expressed uncertainty about their future had he not stayed close to home. Despite early challenges, including a teenage pregnancy, the couple persevered and married in 2013.

title: Scheffler wins BMW, fifth PGA Tour crown of '25
content: Scottie Scheffler erased a four-shot deficit in five holes then delivered a haymaker on the daunting par-3 17th by chipping in from 82 feet for birdie that carried him to victory Sunday in the BMW Championship for his fifth PGA Tour title of the year.

title: Johnson praises Williams: Bears QB 'locked in'
content: Bears quarterback Caleb Williams put together a sharp preseason debut Sunday night that capped his best stretch of training camp and earned praise from coach Ben Johnson.

title: Vols name Aguilar starting QB after Iamaleava exit
content: Joey Aguilar was named Tennessee's starting quarterback Sunday, beating out redshirt freshman Jake Merklinger for the job.

title: Sources: Jaguars acquire DT Saunders from Saints
content: The Jaguars have acquired veteran defensive tackle Khalen Saunders from the New Orleans Saints for veteran center Luke Fortner, sources confirmed.

title: Sources: DFA'd by Nats, Lowe set to join Red Sox
content: Veteran first baseman Nathaniel Lowe, 30, designated for assignment by the Washington Nationals earlier this month, and the Boston Red Sox are finalizing a deal, sources told ESPN, paving the way for him to join one of the strongest lineups in baseball.

title: Omaha forward Mayar dies in drowning incident
content: Omaha Mavericks forward Deng Mayar, who transferred from North Dakota this offseason, died Saturday in a drowning incident.

title: Howell, 18, wins U.S. Amateur; youngest since '09
content: Mason Howell, 18, capped a productive summer before his senior year of high school by winning the U.S. Amateur at The Olympic Club on Sunday. He's the third-youngest U.S. Amateur champion ever.

title: M's Robles ejected for throwing bat at AAA pitcher
content: During his rehabilitation assignment with Triple-A Tacoma on Sunday, Mariners veteran outfielder Victor Robles was ejected from a game in Las Vegas, after he was nearly hit by an inside pitch and tossed his bat at starting pitcher Joey Estes.

title: üèà Fantasy Football 2025: Ultimate Draft Board
content: Mike Clay provides his blueprint for 2025 fantasy football drafts, including ideal selections in each round and overall strategy.

title: Tory Horton, Jaxson Dart, Adonai Mitchell among deep sleepers for 2025
content: These players are truly for those in deeper leagues seeking off-the-radar types who may emerge in 2025.

title: Inside the hidden costs of football: '88 Saints speak out
content: Nearly 40 years after their time in the NFL, the players from the 1988 New Orleans Saints grapple with the physical toll of football while honoring a bond forged through the toughest game.

title: Venus Williams is back at the US Open -- eyeing one title not on her long list
content: Two-time former US Open champion Venus Williams will play again this week. And she still has one major career goal.

title: Arsenal begin new season in style as problems persist for Man United
content: Arsenal open their Premier League campaign with a crucial 1-0 win at Manchester United, exposing the key differences between the two sides.

title: Akie Iwai wins Portland Classic for first LPGA Tour title
content: Akie Iwai joined twin sister Chisato as a rookie LPGA Tour winner Sunday at Columbia Edgewater, closing with a 6-under 66 for a four-stroke victory in The Standard Portland Classic.

title: Zack Wheeler on IL with blood clot: What it means, what to expect
content: With Phillies ace Zack Wheeler on the IL with blood clots, what does that mean and how have other pitchers fared?

title: Texans and Eagles trading previously dealt picks back to each other? Who won the Bryant-Metchie trade?
content: Who won the recent Texans-Eagles trade? What about the Jalen Ramsey-Minkah Fitzpatrick swap? We sized up the offseason's trades.

title: Chimaev-Makhachev? Murphy-Volkanovski? Possibilities for UFC 319 winners
content: The summer's last pay-per-view event produced a new champion and chances for more fireworks to end 2025.

title: Bowl projections: Every matchup from the Celebration Bowl to the national title game
content: It's August and no games have been played, but we're breaking down who will be where in December and beyond.

title: üéµ Taylor Swift joins Kelce brothers on 'New Heights'
content: The superstar debuted on Jason and Travis Kelce's "New Heights" podcast, talked about becoming a football fan -- and even caught Caitlin Clark's attention.

title: üìà NFL Future Power Rankings
content: We ranked all 32 NFL franchises' expectations for 2025 through 2027. Which teams are set up to thrive in the future?

title: üèà Predicting best, worst scenarios for NFL teams
content: We simulated best-case and worst-case scenarios for every team, and our NFL reporters picked the biggest variables.

title: üèÄ Is there any coming back for banned Knicks fans?
content: Despite backlash, MSG Entertainment's "attorney exclusion list" is still in effect, reportedly banning over a thousand lawyers since 2022.

title: Is Flagg a ROY lock? How 11 rookies can challenge the No. 1 pick
content: NBA analyst Kevin Pelton groups 11 players most likely to threaten the Mavericks' No. 1 pick for the auspicious award.

title: Jon Rahm defends LIV points title but loses in playoff
content: Jon Rahm successfully defended his LIV Golf season points title but still lost in a playoff to Sebastian Munoz in the Indianapolis event.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United to bring De Gea back?
content: Manchester United could bring goalkeeper David de Gea back to the club. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Andhra Minister Nara Lokesh meets Union Minister Jaishankar; seeks support for various initiatives¬†
content: Andhra Pradesh IT Minister Nara Lokesh requested S. Jaishankar to help positioning Andhra Pradesh as a frontrunner in India‚Äôs global workforce vision

title: Supreme Court stays HC order reversing discharge of T.N. Minister, family members in DA case
content: The Minister has argued that these cases were products of the political rivalry, referring to a similar disproportionate assets case registered against him and his family concerning tax returns between 1996 and 2001

title: Government introduces Jan Vishwas (Amendment of Provisions) Bill in Lok Sabha, refers to Select Committee
content: Introducing the Bill, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said the Bill seeks to enhance trust-based governance for ease of doing business

title: Tamil Nadu MPs should support C.P. Radhakrishnan for Vice-President post: Edappadi Palaniswami
content: All MPs, shedding their political differences, should back Radhakrishnan, urged the AIADMK general secretary

title: Plight of cadets suffering disability: Supreme Court asks Centre to file comprehensive reply; contemplates bringing them under ECH scheme
content: A Bench of Justices B.V. Nagarathna¬†and K.V. Viswanathan asks the Centre to find out if there is any scheme to provide them insurance cover, ex-gratia lumpsum amount and rehabilitation

title: Air India cancels Zurich-Delhi flight citing technical issue
content: In the last two days, Air India has cancelled at least two flights, including one international, at the last moment, citing technical reasons

title: Kerala rains: IMD sounds orange alert for two districts, yellow for seven
content: Presence of strong westerlies over Kerala fuelled by the low-pressure area is expected to cause widespread rains across parts of central and north Kerala for the next few days

title: Supreme Court affirms HC order quashing FIR in Mohan Delkar death case
content: The Bombay High Court, in 2022, had quashed the case against nine persons in the abetment of suicide case of former Lok Sabha MP Mohan Delkar in 2021

title: Low pressure over Bay of Bengal likely to intensify; heavy rains forecast for Andhra Pradesh
content: Under its influence, coastal Andhra Pradesh is expected to receive widespread rains, with heavy to very heavy rainfall at isolated places. Rayalaseema districts may witness light to moderate showers

title: Search for missing enters fifth day in cloudburst-hit J&K‚Äôs Kishtwar village despite heavy rain
content: Rescue teams brave rain and debris to search for missing persons after cloudburst in Chisoti, Jammu and Kashmir

title: 32 children, a teacher hospitalised after van accident in Kerala‚Äôs Thiruvananthapuram
content: Incident raises questions about safety of transporting children to schools, especially in crowded private vans, cars and autorickshaws

title: SIR is ‚Äònew weapon‚Äô of ‚Äòvote chori‚Äô, will protect ‚Äòone person, one vote‚Äô, says Rahul Gandhi
content: The "collusion" of BJP and Election Commission is punishing them for being 'Bahujan' and poor ‚Äî even our soldiers were not spared, Mr. Gandhi said

title: Tungabhadra Aarti Utsav at Huligi in Karnataka on August 26 to be organised on grand scale by Huligemma Devi Temple Development Authority
content: Koppal MLA K. Raghavendra Hitnal said that the Huligemma Devi Temple Development Authority is celebrating the Tungabhadra Aarti on such a grand scale for the first time

title: INDIA bloc considering impeachment motion against CEC Gyanesh Kumar
content: Parliament can remove the CEC by a motion with two-thirds majority in both Houses; for the motion to be accepted, at least 50 members have to sign in favour of it

title: K.C. Venugopal seeks urgent action to ease highway congestion in Kerala
content: Venugopal urges Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan to deploy more police personnel to regulate traffic on highways

title: India‚Äôs purchase of Russian crude funding war in Ukraine, has to stop: U.S. trade adviser Navarro
content: ‚ÄúIndia acts as a global clearinghouse for Russian oil, converting embargoed crude into high-value exports while giving Moscow the dollars it needs,‚Äù Peter Navarro said in an opinion piece published in the Financial Times

title: Ahead of Wang Yi‚Äôs arrival, Congress flags Beijing‚Äôs support to Pakistan during Operation Sindoor
content: India has agreed to "buffer zones" in Galwan, Hot Spring, and Pangong Tso that lie within the Indian claim line, said Jairam Ramesh

title: Water tank collapse at Eranhiparambu in Kerala‚Äôs Kozhikode floods houses, worsens water shortage
content: One of the concrete walls of the square-shaped tank gave way, producing a loud noise that alerted local residents

title: India monsoon LIVE: Mumbai receives heavy rains for third day; schools and colleges shut as red alert issued
content: Yamuna likely to cross ‚Äòdanger level‚Äô in Delhi; Chandigarh-Manali National Highway in Himachal Pradesh blocked due to flash floods

title: BJD supremo Naveen Patnaik stable, likely to be discharged on August 18: Hospital source
content: The former Odisha CM Patnaik was admitted to SUM Ultimate Medicare, Bhubaneswar, on August 17, 2025 due to dehydration

title: An embodiment of justice and wrath caught up in controversy
content: A character in the epic Silappadhikaram, Kannagi is known for cursing the city of Madurai and burning it down as revenge for the unjust execution of her husband Kovalan

title: Parliament Monsoon session Day 18 LIVE: Both Houses adjourn till 2 p.m. amid Opposition protests
content: INDIA bloc mulls impeachment motion against CEC Gyanesh Kumar; Lok Sabha to hold special discussion on the impact of Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla‚Äôs space mission today

title: A flight of stairs where intense scenes unfold
content: The Rajaji Hall, with its grand colonial-era architecture, has become a popular shooting locale. Many iconic scenes from yesteryear hits such as Thalapathi and Alexander were filmed here

title: Five men electrocuted to death, four others injured during Krishna Shobha Yatra in Hyderabad
content: The mishap was reported around midnight during a Krishna Janmashtami procession being carried out by locals

title: A versatile art form that steals Chennai‚Äôs heart
content: With its thumping rhythm, easy lyrics, and quick beats, Gaana music captures not only the essence of the lives of the working class but also the struggles of marginalised communities, particularly those from the city‚Äôs northern areas

title: How ‚Äòhonour‚Äô killings in India are reinforced and legitimised
content: States like Tamil Nadu, Telangana, Maharashtra, and Kerala ‚Äî where Dalit communities have seen relatively greater empowerment ‚Äî record higher rates of inter-caste marriages. Ironically, these are also the States with increased incidents of honour killings

title: Student found dead in hostel of BITS Pilani Goa campus; cops launch probe
content: The police were informed and have initiated the required procedures to ascertain the cause of death, and "we are fully cooperating", the institute said

title: Heavy Rain Leads To Massive Traffic Jam In Mumbai, Many Areas Flooded
content: Mumbai continued to receive heavy rains for the third consecutive day on Monday, leading to water-logging in some low-lying areas, officials said.

title: "BJP Has Failed": Arvind Kejriwal After Bomb Threats To 3 Delhi Schools
content: Former Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Monday lashed out at the BJP, saying its "four-engine" government has failed to maintain law and order after three schools in the national capital received bomb threats.

title: Opposition Likely To Bring Impeachment Motion Against Poll Body Chief: Sources
content: Amid its face-off with the Election Commission over allegations of vote fraud, the INDIA Opposition bloc is considering bringing a motion to remove Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar, sources have said.

title: Prince William And Princess Kate To Move To New Home In Windsor This Year
content: The Prince and Princess of Wales are all set to relocate their family from Adelaide Cottage to Forest Lodge, a larger and more private residence in Windsor Great Park, Britain's PA Media news agency confirmed.

title: Narrow Escape For 25 Girls As Fire Destroys Beds, Books At Jharkhand School Hostel
content: At least 25 girls had a narrow escape when a fire broke out in a hostel room of a residential school in Jharkhand's Latehar district on Monday morning, police said.

title: Video: Small Plane Crash Lands On Golf Course In Australia, 2 Injured
content: A small aircraft crash-landed on a Sydney golf course in Australia on Sunday afternoon. The plane had two men, both in their 50s, onboard when it went down. They sustained minor injuries.

title: Living Abroad, These Gangsters Were Behind Firing At Elvish Yadav's House
content: The role of three gangsters has emerged in the firing outside controversial YouTuber Elvish Yadav's home in Gurugram yesterday.

title: 4 Maoists, Active For A Decade, Surrender With Rs 19 Lakh Bounty In Chhattisgarh
content: Inspector General Raipur Range, Amresh Mishra, called it the success of the police force and added, "This is an unprecedented success for Gariaband Police, this area, and for the state.

title: "India Acts As Global Clearinghouse For Russian Oil": Trump Trade Advisor
content: White House trade adviser Peter Navarro said India's purchases of Russian crude were funding Moscow's war in Ukraine and had to stop, adding that New Delhi was "now cozying up to both Russia and China."

title: 2 Karnataka Girls Flee Homes After Scoring Low Marks, Found In Mumbai
content: Two girls, aged 13 and 10, ran away from their homes in Karnataka's Uttara Kannada district on Monday after scoring low marks in school exams and fearing academic pressure from parents.

title: Video: Stray Dog Bites Elderly Man On Face, Locals Say He's Victim No. 14
content: Amid the nationwide debate over stray dogs, civic staff of Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Municipal Corporation are on the lookout for a stray dog that has injured 14 people so far

title: Russian Drone Strike Kills 3 In Kharkiv Ahead Of Zelensky-Trump Meet
content: An overnight Russian drone strike on Kharkiv killed three people, including a child, and wounded more than a dozen others, Ukrainian authorities said Monday.

title: "They Were Kids, Probably 16-19 Years": Indian Man Attacked With Knife In Ireland
content: A 22-year-old Indian man who was recently harassed with racist slurs and assaulted with a knife by three teenagers in Ireland has narrated the turn of events that left him injured while returning home.

title: "Can't Create Horror": Supreme Court's Big Stray Dogs Order Challenged
content: Hearing petitions challenging the Supreme Court order to round up stray dogs in Delhi and move them to shelter homes, another bench of the court today asked why authorities in several areas started picking up animals even before the order was public

title: Marco Rubio Explains Why China Spared, India Faces Tariffs On Russian Oil
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio has explained why America has spared China -- Russia's biggest oil buyer -- from any secondary sanctions, even as 50 per cent tariffs were imposed on India, including a 25 per cent duty for buying Russian oil.

title: How Trump's Russia-Ukraine Peace-Deal Demands Leave Zelensky With Only Bad Options
content: Volodymyr Zelensky finds himself in an impossible bind: risk Donald Trump's wrath or accept a quick deal to end Russia's war in Ukraine by paying the disastrous price of ceding territory for vague security guarantees.

title: On Camera, Floodwaters In Dehradun Sweep Away Car, Driver Rescued By Locals
content: The floodwaters swept away a car in Uttarakhand's Dehradun after its driver attempted to cross a submerged stretch on Sunday. The overflowing rivers and streams, a direct result of heavy rains, have left roads and low-lying crossings waterlogged.

title: 7 Killed After Cloudburst, Landslide In Jammu And Kashmir's Kathua, Rescue Ops On
content: At least seven people were killed and many others were injured in two separate incidents of cloudburst and landslide in Jammu and Kashmir's Kathua district, officials said on Sunday.

title: Thane Man Duped Of Rs 41 Lakh In Online Trading Scam, Case Filed: Cops
content: Two persons allegedly cheated a 48-year-old man from Maharashtra's Thane city of Rs 40.99 lakh in a fake online trading scheme, police said on Monday.

title: Weekend rush and incessant rain add to pilgrims‚Äô woes in Tirupati
content: The Tirumala temple is bursting at its seams as several make unplanned visit; heavy demand for seats in private buses bound for Hyderabad and Bengaluru

title: Social justice is ensuring that one section of community is not traditionally involved in garbage disposal: Thirumavalavan
content: Mr. Thirumavalavan rued the slander faced by the Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi and pressure exerted to leave the DMK alliance

title: 20 tourists left stranded by guide in Ranthambore tiger safari; probe ordered
content: Three canter drivers and the guide have been barred from entering the park till the probe is completed, Deputy Conservator of Forests (DCF) Pramod Dhakad said

title: Delhi-bound Air India flight aborts take off at Kochi airport due to technical issue
content: The matter came to light after Ernakulam MP Hibi Eden posted on social media that the aircraft in which he was travelling with family seemed to have skidded off the runway while attempting to take off

title: Snag in Air India‚Äôs Delhi-bound flight from Kochi; MP flags safety concerns
content: The matter came to light after Ernakulam MP Hibi Eden posted on social media that the aircraft in which he was travelling with family seemed to have skidded off the runway while attempting to take off

title: Maharashtra CM Fadnavis, his Deputy CMs congratulate Radhakrishnan over V-P nomination
content: ‚ÄúRadhakrishnan‚Äôs selection as the Vice-Presidential candidate fills us all Maharashtrians with immense pride‚Äù says Maharashtra CM

title: IndiGo flight makes sudden ‚Äògo around‚Äô at Assam‚Äôs Guwahati airport
content: A go-around, also known as a missed approach or aborted landing, is a procedure where an aircraft, during its final approach or after touchdown, discontinues its landing attempt and climbs back into the air for another approach or diversion

title: Dasara elephants on special diet as rehearsals gather pace in Mysuru
content: As part of the rehearsals, they will be carrying sandbags weighing nearly 500 kg to start with, which will gradually be increased to reach a maximum of about 1,000 to 1,200 kg

title: Writers, activists condemn statements by Ministers and BJP¬†on Dharmasthala case
content: A group of senior writers and activists from the State, under the banner of Jagruta Nagareekaru - Karnataka, have condemned statements by multiple Ministers in the Congress government and the Bharatiya Janata Party regarding the ongoing probe into alleged burials at Dharmasthala

title: Two dead, over 300 injured in Dahi Handi festivities in Mumbai
content: The Dahi Handi festival, celebrated a day after Krishna Janmashtami, involves the formation of a human pyramid to break an earthen pot with curd in it

title: People of West Bengal want SIR, says State BJP chief
content: Leader of the Opposition Suvendu Adhikari has claimed that four categories of voters, including deceased voters and voters who are residents of Bangladesh, will be removed from the rolls

title: CJI B.R. Gavai inaugurates Bombay High Court circuit Bench at Kolhapur
content: At present, apart from the principal bench in Mumbai, the HC has two more benches ‚Äî at Nagpur in Vidarbha region and Aurangabad (Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar) in Marathwada region. A third bench of the High Court sits in adjoining Goa

title: INDIA bloc to hold talks on V-P candidate
content: A senior Congress leader told The Hindu that they will reach out to senior leaders of the opposition bloc over phone to arrive at a consensus candidate.

title: Lok Sabha to hold special discussion on the impact of Astronaut Shukla‚Äôs space mission
content: Opposition to take a call at the Monday morning meeting of the Opposition floor leaders on whether it will take part in the discussion or continue with its protests on SIR

title: File affidavit in seven days or apologise: ECI ultimatum on Rahul Gandhi‚Äôs Karnataka vote theft allegations
content: CEC Gyanesh Kumar refuses to provide machine-readable voter lists, CCTV footage of polling, citing voter privacy concerns; says if complaints are not filed within 45 days of poll results, parties must file affidavits

title: Lahar Singh petitions ECI on audio clip in which a Congress MLA allegedly speaks on cash distribution to voters
content: BJP Rajya Sabha member Lahar Singh Siroya has urged the Election Commission of India (ECI) to investigate an audio clip allegedly featuring Congress MLA for Arsikere K.M. Shivalinge Gowda discussing cash distribution for¬†voters during the 2024 Lok Sabha polls ¬†

title: Temple authorities in Karnataka directed to impose fines on those using plastic items, says Minister
content: With the State government banning the use of plastic on the premises of temples coming under the Hindu Religious Institutions and Charitable Endowments Department from August 15, a plastic ban awareness programme was organised by the department

title: New GST regime will be consumer-centric, says Centre
content: The new two-tier Goods and Services Tax (GST) structure of 18% and 5% rates will have the twin objective of making rates and processes simpler and more rational, as it was originally intended to be, say senior government sources

title: Disturbing that PM did not mention Nehru in I-Day speech: Sharad Pawar
content: NCP(SP) chief says 300 Opposition MPs united in peaceful protest for first time against ECI; recalls how Maharashtra Congress had once prioritised unity for ideological reasons in post-Emergency era

title: Protesting teachers plotting to incite violence during rally: West Bengal police
content: Deputy Commissioner of Police, Bidhannagar Anish Sarkar released an audio conversation between two persons who were allegedly making plans to incite violence during the march on Monday

title: Former Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik admitted to hospital
content: According to BJD, the  Leader of the Opposition is suffering from dehydration and will be discharged soon

title: Seven women and children among eight charred to death in car-SUV collision
content: The horrific accident occurred on a highway near Dedadara village in Wadhwan taluka at around 3:40 p.m. when the car was headed towards Surendranagar city from Kadu village.

title: Inaccuracies flagged in Class IV textbook
content: Errors found in Environmental Science textbook. SCERT says mistakes found after printing are immediately corrected on the website. However, corrections have been made only on the Malayalam version

title: State seeks additional supply of urea coming in 4 ships by month-end to overcome 2.69L tonnes short supply
content: Minister for Agriculture Tummala Nageswara Rao says problems in functioning of RFCL Ramagudam also added to urea scarcity

title: Demand to introduce MEMU service, augment coaches in trains in Ernakulam-Thrissur corridor
content: Passengers say traffic snarls on the stretch could continue for another 10 months until the works to decongest bottlenecked junctions on NH 544 are complete

title: Tamil Nadu prepares the ground to grab a major share in semiconductor landscape
content: Tamil Nadu‚Äôs Semiconductor Design Promotion Scheme, which part of its ‚Çπ500-crore¬†Tamil Nadu Semiconductor Mission 2030, is  aimed at turbocharging the State‚Äôs¬†fabless¬†design ecosystem by offering targeted subsidies and prototyping grants

title: Low FMGE pass percentage: medical aspirants cautious about foreign varsities
content: Georgia, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, and Kyrgyzstan new favourites as war situation takes the sheen out of Ukraine and Russia

title: Five held for slaughtering cattle in Nelamangala
content: Police registered a case against unknown persons charging them under Karnataka Prevention of Cow Slaughter and Preservation of Cattle Act, 2020

title: Hemachandran murder: one more suspect nabbed from Wayanad
content: The man, identified as Melbin Mathew, was nabbed for his alleged role in covering the planned abduction and murder

title: Constitutional validity does not mean desirability, ex-CJI Khanna tells one nation, one election panel
content: Justice Sanjiv Khanna has joined a few other former CJIs in raising concerns over the extent of power given to the Election Commission in the Bill

title: Leak of complaint submitted to CPI(M) Polit Bureau triggers political controversy
content: Satheesan demands clarification from party and government on the veracity of the accusations in the complaint

title: BJP leaders to be questioned regarding Suresh Gopi‚Äôs suspected leopard tooth pendant
content: Congress worker shares video clips of the Minister walking along the Swaraj Round wearing the suspected wildlife trophy, identifies one of the accompanying persons as Thrissur BJP president. He terms the other person identifiable

title: The NBA schedule is out! Best games -- and beefs -- to watch
content: the regular season begins Oct. 21 with reigning NBA champion Kevin Durant 's new team, the Houston Rockets . leBron James , Luka Doncic and the Los Angeles Lakers host Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors . plenty of stars will don new jerseys setting up must-see reunions and playoff rematches as the season approaches .

title: ‚öæ MLB awards: Sanchez, Skenes for NL Cy Young?
content: this month's awards watch reflects changes atop some races and separation in others . the two methods of tracking these things are in complete accord when it comes to anointing the current favorites . a lot can and will change in short period of time in a big league baseball season .

title: ‚õ≥ Augusta National ditches masses for revenue
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local Hooters restaurant is closing .

title: NFL preseason trade tracker: Every move leading up to the 2025 season
content: the NFL preseason has arrived, with all 32 teams navigating their training camps and prepping for the 2025 season . as teams continue to tinker with their final rosters, we are tracking every trade before the season kicks off on sept. 4 . the latest moves came Sunday, with the Eagles sending tight end Harrison Bryant to Houston for wide receiver John Metchie III .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: NFL preseason Week 2 takeaways: Caleb Williams looks sharp in preseason debut
content: the second week of the 2025 preseason kicked off on friday . the Bears didn't let a bungled kickoff return that buried them at the 8-yard line on their first drive or a holding penalty derail momentum .

title: What NFL scouts make of Arch Manning, what Texas can expect from him
content: arch Manning will get his chance to be the face of the longhorns this season . he won't get the chance to ease into the starting role as top-ranked Texas will play at defending national champion and no. 3-ranked Ohio State in its season opener on august 30 .
